product_name: ICEBUG Heros BUGrip Running Shoes - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The stable ICEBUG Heros BUGrip(R) Running Shoes have carbide studs in the soles and water-resistant uppers to help keep you on track with your training despite icy and snowy terrain. Polyurethane and ripstop nylon uppers are water resistant to keep moisture out when you're running on wet and snowy trails. Innovative BUGrip(R) rubber outsoles use 15 durable carbide-tipped spikes to grip slippery and wet surfaces. Soles feel normal when you're walking on concrete and pavement but provide excellent grip when you need it. EVA midsoles and polyurethane shanks support your feet during long training runs. Reflective trim increases your visibility at night. Fully gusseted tongues keep debris out. Closeout.
short_description: The stable ICEBUG Heros BUGrip(R) Running Shoes have carbide studs in the soles and water-resistant uppers to help keep you on track with your training despite icy and snowy terrain.
